mapper.select: select password from movie_user where id=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO movie_user ( id, password, name, birthday, email, zipcode, address, address2, phone ) VALUES( #{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, #{birthday}, #{zipcode}, #{address}, #{address2}, #{phone} )
mapper.update: update movie_user set password=#{password}, name=#{name}, birthday=#{birthday}, email=#{email}, zipcode=#{zipcode}, address=#{address}, address2=#{address2}, phone=#{phone} where id=#{id}
